image_1.title: Buket Boneka
image_1.content: A sweet combination of charm and elegance, the doll + flower bouquet pairs adorable plush toys with beautiful fresh flowers. Ideal for gifting on special occasions like graduations or romantic gestures, this bundle brings joy, warmth, and a lasting impression.

image_2.title: Buket Bunga
image_2.content: A classic symbol of love and appreciation, our flower bouquets are thoughtfully arranged using fresh, hand-picked blooms. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or simply to brighten someone's day, each bouquet delivers natural beauty and heartfelt meaning in every petal.

image_3.title: Buket Coklat
image_3.content: The ultimate gesture of love and indulgence, this bouquet blends premium chocolates with fresh, fragrant flowers. Whether for a romantic date or a luxurious surprise, this combo delights both the heart and the taste buds — a timeless treat for any celebration.

image_4.title: Handicraft
image_4.content: Handcrafted with precision and creativity, our beads handicrafts reflect a deep appreciation for artistry. From elegant accessories to intricate decorative pieces, each item is a unique expression of tradition, patience, and modern design — perfect for thoughtful gifts or personal collections.

image_5.title: Buket Bunga Spesial
image_5.content: A delightful trio of sweetness, elegance, and charm — this bouquet features luxurious chocolates, fresh handpicked flowers, and a cuddly plush doll. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or heartfelt surprises, it’s a gift that speaks love, warmth, and thoughtfulness all at once.

image_6.title: Gantungan Tas
image_6.content: Handwoven with care and creativity, our beaded bags are a blend of tradition and modern style. Each piece is meticulously crafted with colorful beads, forming elegant patterns that stand out. Whether for everyday wear or special occasions, this accessory adds a touch of handmade beauty to any outfit.
